abstract.text: Application which is main API component for Vernissage photos sharing platform.
Url of the status shared via ActivityPub protocol,
Hashtag that can be mapped to the category.
Follow stores information about followers and following users.
Status is reply for this status.
Information about external user created from OAuth.
Entity that holds all system settings.
Events that occurs in the system.
Id of the status shared via ActivityPub protocol,
